amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

disallowableAmount.title: Disallowable amount
disallowableAmount.description: Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.
